channel.title: Need Help With Dueling Glitch!
channel.description: Ok I'm using richscape v5 and when I right click duel someone and we duel it takes us to the duel arena but it says were in a safe zone...It lets you mage each other but you can't melee or range.....HELP! PLEASE!

item.title: Need Help With Dueling Glitch!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Ok I’m using richscape v5 and when I right click duel someone and we duel it takes us to the duel arena but it says were in a safe zone…It lets you mage each other but you can’t melee or range…HELP! PLEASE!

Read full topic
